MS MCQs

    Dynamics 365 Marketing

    »

    1. What are some of the ways in which Dynamics 365 helps modern marketers work smarter to find the right prospects and build long-lasting relationships?

      With omni-channel marketing campaigns, dashboards, and intelligent tools.

      With custom text messaging, customer-relationship management, and social media integration.

      With demonstrations, dashboards, and artificial intelligence.


    2. What can a marketer do with Dynamics 365 Marketing?

      Search social media platforms and make travel arrangements.

      Reach out to customers through social media and program robo-calls.

      Design bulk emails, set up a customer journey, and create lead-scoring models.


    3. How will a sales representative know when a marketer has handed off a lead in an organization that is using Dynamics 365 Marketing and Dynamics 365 Sales?

      The sales representative will receive an email with the lead’s contact information.

      The sales representative will receive a text message prompting them to contact the marketer.

      The sales representative will see it appear in Dynamics 365 Sales.
